title: Regulatory Approvals
description: Expert assistance in navigating through the complex landscape of regulatory approvals across various government bodies and legal frameworks, ensuring compliance and facilitating foreign and domestic investments.

services.title: Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) Approvals
points: Obtaining prior approval or registration to accept foreign contributions under the Foreign Contribution (Regulation) Act (FCRA).
Seeking post facto approval for foreign contributions received in violation of FCRA regulations.
Filing annual returns and handling other compliance requirements for societies or trusts accepting foreign contributions.

services.title: Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA) Approvals
points: Obtaining approvals and exemptions under various provisions of the Companies Act, 2013.

services.title: Facilitating Foreign Investment
points: Obtaining approval from respective ministries for activities not covered under the automatic investment route.
Approval for share transfers between resident and non-resident Indians in sectors not covered by the automatic route.
Seeking clarifications on FEMA provisions from the Department of Industrial Policy and Promotion (DIPP).

services.title: Foreign Exchange Management Act, 1999 (FEMA) Approvals
points: Preparing and filing form FC-GPR for issuing shares to non-resident investors.
Filing annual return on foreign liabilities and assets with the Reserve Bank of India.
Handling compounding of offences under FEMA regulations.
Obtaining various approvals under FEMA for activities such as external commercial borrowings and operation of foreign liaison offices in India.
Seeking specific case clarifications from RBI regional or central offices.
Advising on overseas direct investment, portfolio investments, and liberalized remittance schemes.
Representing or advising on matters related to the Enforcement Directorate.

services.title: Companies Act, 2013 Approvals
points: Seeking approvals for shifting registered office across state lines.
Approval for unconventional financial year endings.
Representing and seeking clearances on restructuring matters such as mergers, demergers, and buybacks.
Handling compounding of offences under the Companies Act, 2013.
Seeking extensions for holding Annual General Meetings (AGM) from the Registrar of Companies (ROC).
Assisting in the conversion of firms or companies into LLPs or from private to public companies.
Obtaining approvals related to Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) activities.
